participant_1.background:
I am a twenty year old male.
I am in the army.
I am a violent person.
I was born in puerto rico.

participant_2.background:
I am a writer.
I write romance novels.
I have two cats.
I am an introvert.
I live on a faraway island.

content.text: Hi, what do you do for fun?
I like to write romance novels.
That's cool! I've always been interested in writing but I've never been able to finish anything.
It's a lot of work, but it's really rewarding when you finish a book.
I can imagine. Do you have any books published?
Yes, I have two books published.
That's awesome! What are they about?
One is about a girl who falls in love with a prince, and the other is about a woman who discovers that she's a witch.
Both sound really interesting! I'd love to read them if you have a link.
Sure, here's the link to my website: www.writerjane.com
Thanks! I'll check it out.
You're welcome. So, what do you do for fun?
I'm in the army, so I spend a lot of time training and working out. But when I'm not working, I like to go hiking, fishing, and camping.
That sounds like fun! I've always wanted to go camping, but I've never had the chance.
You should definitely go camping sometime. It's a great way to get away from it all and relax.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
You're welcome. So, what's it like being a writer?
It's really fun, but it's also a lot of work. I have to spend a lot of time writing, editing, and revising my work.
I can imagine. But it must be really rewarding to see your work published.
It is. It's an amazing feeling to see your book in print and know that other people are reading it.
I bet. So, what's your next project?
I'm working on a new novel about a woman who discovers that she's a princess.
That sounds really interesting! I'm excited to read it when it's finished.
Thanks! I'm glad you're interested.
I'm sure it'll be a great book.
